roleset.name: make mutual/return accusations against
roleset.note: RECRIMINATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6; relation to incriminate.01. (from recrimination.01-n)

roles.note: For the crime, use CAU (from recrimination.01-n)

example.name: arg0
example.text: this is just a game of recrimination between officials and merchants . As ordinary people , we 'd better be just an audience !
